title: Sentinel-6 Michael Freilich Launch Updates
content:
1 min read
The world's newest sea level-measuring satellite, Sentinel-6 Michael Freilich, is scheduled to launch on Saturday, Nov. 21, at 9:17 a.m. PT. Here are some resources for keeping up with the latest on this event:
